<title level="1" right="Rules">[Founding a Village](/Rules.aspx?ID=1831)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 542</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Your kingdom's first settlement is automatically founded in [Step 8 of Kingdom Creation](/Rules.aspx?ID=1755). You can found new settlements and expand on existing settlements during the [Civic Activities](/Rules.aspx?ID=1808) step of the Activity phase of the Kingdom turn.

 When you found a village, follow the four steps presented below to get started.
